original_title: UFC Fight Night 209: Gane vs. Tuivasa
overview: UFC Fight Night 209: Gane vs. Tuivasa was a mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship that took place on September 3, 2022, at Accor Arena in Paris, France. A heavyweight bout between former interim UFC Heavyweight Champion Ciryl Gane and Tai Tuivasa headlined the event.
title: UFC Fight Night 209: Gane vs. Tuivasa
